item.title: Exploring DFA, NFA, and Turing Machines: A Journey Through Theoretical Computer Science and Building a Programming Language
item.description: Hey everyone, itâ€™s alanturrr1703 back again! ðŸ˜„ Today, weâ€™re going to explore some of the most important concepts in theoretical computer science: Deterministic Finite Automata (DFA), Nondeterministic Finite Automata (NFA), and Turing Machines.
